thread.title: Cosy hotel, centrally located
thread.title_full: Cosy hotel, centrally located - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: EU4
title: Cosy hotel, centrally located
text:
We stayed here for one night as we were going to the Queen's Theatre which is very close by.
We had an accessible room, which was just big enough to manoeuvre the wheelchair in. The bathroom was a wet-room style with plenty of space.
The staff were friendly and helpful, especially where the wheelchair was concerned.
The attached restaurant ('Hankies') offered delicious Indian small plates and a selection of unusual craft beers. Breakfast was extensive and served in the same place.
